If you forget your account password and lose access, you can now recovery your account for a $20 BTC fee. This also applies for inactive (closed) accounts but not for other closed accounts. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/recovery.php] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6059452][color=#FFFFFF]The UK is essentially now locked down.[/color][/url] - [mention=4031008]
Boris Johnson has announced that anyone in the UK must NOT leave their homes for the next few weeks unless for emergencies or exercising providing they're not doing that with people, or if you cant work from home. This was advised since people within the UK didn't follow the information given by Borris previously.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6059002][color=#FFFFFF]Australia now on Lockdown[/color][/url] - [mention=4293813]
Prime Minister Scott Morrison announced that they are focusing Casinos, Cinemas, Pubs, Clubs, Gyms, and Places of Worship are closed. This is a similar action the rest of the world is taking. Shops are still open but are limiting how much people can have and how many people are allowed in at once.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6059179][color=#FFFFFF]Do you think governments' responses to the cornavirus are warranted?[/color][/url] - [mention=2514842]
The governments around the world are all taking very similar actions to there own areas, the responses to the coronavirus are all over the place depending on who you hear everything from. Each news source says something different but do you think its all right?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6059089][color=#FFFFFF]Coronavirus Quarantine and Shutdowns[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
Omniscient has made a thread talking about how Las Vegas is dead and how the strip is in a never seen like state. Omniscient says that it's supposed to last another 30 days but a lot of people are posting that it's going to be a lot longer than 30 days.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6059093][color=#FFFFFF]Awesome opportunity for you to stop smoking[/color][/url] - [mention=3364775]
Since the whole coronavirus outbreak, it has come to an important attempt to contain people who are smokers since it can make you have very short breath and people plus the news have stated how it would be a really good time to stop smoking since people will be self-isolated for at least two whole weeks.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6059476][color=#FFFFFF]What are your favorite podcasts/Audiobooks?[/color][/url] - [mention=4635757]
In other news podcasts and audiobooks are in the news today. We all have tried an audiobook as its a lot easier than just sitting down and reading the whole book, also some of us may even listen to a podcast when we have the time and gilbert2426 is asking everyone what are your favorite is?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6058220][color=#FFFFFF]Which companies will come out even richer?[/color][/url] - [mention=3713117]
The whole virus outbreak has put a lot of small businesses out or maybe even bankrupted them as it can cause a very heavy financial issue, but there are some companies that will make a massive margin in profits because they will not even be affected by fewer workers or fewer sales.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6058884][color=#FFFFFF]What is your every day OS?[/color][/url] - [mention=2192831]
Computers are a thing we all use every day but we all use them differently, one of the main and most known difference is the operating system that people use. That means you could be a windows person or a macOS person. The member known as Lrrr is asking what you use every day?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6059158][color=#FFFFFF]What does your profile pic mean?[/color][/url] - [mention=4484228]
Profile pictures, we all have them even when you are a new user you make the posts to change it to something you like. We all show a little of our personality with it or we might even show some of our skills with it. But the meaning of the image can be a hard thing to explain for some people.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6056377][color=#FFFFFF][OVER $250 IN PRIZES] OP8 && The Goon Squad Present: The Great Gauntlet[/color][/url] - [mention=2185870]
The new group known as "OP8" and the crew known as "The Goons" have partnered up and made a giveaway offering members who join the giveaway a very large number of prizes. Make sure you check out the thread for your chance to win some really big prizes.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6058642][color=#FFFFFF]$15 BTC / UPGRADE #2! | ANYONE CAN JOIN | MULTIPLE ENTRIES[/color][/url] - [mention=4533593]
A member who goes by the name of omy11 is giving one lucky winner 15 dollars bitcoin, Anyone who is anyone can enter the giveaway and you can even enter more than once so you can really easily boost your chances at getting some easy bitcoin to save for the revival of the coin.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6056976][color=#FFFFFF]$25 BTC Giveway | Multiple Entries Allowed | Hosted By Trend Watchers[/color][/url] - [mention=4597753]
Are you looking to get yourself some easy bitcoin to save or maybe even spend on an upgrade? Well, look no more because TrendWatchers is giving away 25 dollars bitcoin to anyone who enters their little giveaway.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/memo.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Important Question![/color][/b]
Would you rather read an interview or listen to an interview? Voice or text interviews? Would you want to be interviewed over a mic or just text? What if we mix both? Looking for feedback, thanks!

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/gamingnews-redsox.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Call of Duty Warzone: the matchmaking already patched[/color][/b]
Lots of patching has been down early this week on behalf of Activision. They've been posting about hotfixes and small downloadable updates that have made huge improvements to the game and the flow of combat. "It's been an exciting day so far! For those who are still downloading, be sure to follow us for updates! If you're already in Warzone, we've lowered the player count requirements needed to start a match. Staying in lobbies until they're full will help you find matches quicker."  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/call-of-duty-warzone-why-you-should-avoid-playing-/1100-6474636/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 Remastered Appears To Be Coming[/color][/b]
Activision Blizzard remastered the first Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare in 2017, and the organization shows up prepared to give it a similar makeover treatment. The South Korean appraisals board has leaked the game. The Game Rating and Administration Committee (GRAC) site has a posting for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 Campaign Remastered, issued on February 26th. Given the name, this is only a remaster of the story mode, not the multiplayer.   [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/call-of-duty-modern-warfare-2-remastered-appears-t/1100-6475013/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]PS5 Backwards Compatibility Will Support Popular PS4's Games[/color][/b]
During The Road to PS5 live stream, PlayStation 5 lead system architect Mark Cerny went into detail about the internal hardware, features, and specs of Sony's upcoming next-gen console. When it came to backward compatibility, Cerny was able to give a small amount of light on the company's approach, and it sounds as if not all PS4 games will be playable right on the initial release day. "Sony has clarified its statement on backward compatibility, noting that the 100 games mentioned were a sampling used for testing and that it has since tested even more, with thousands of others slated to be tested before launch. It expects most games will be compatible based on previous tests but has not given an exact figure."  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/ps5-backwards-compatibility-will-support-popular-p/1100-6474922/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Anime Central 2020 Convention Canceled[/color][/b]
Another popular event is sadly being canceled due to COVID-19. This time, it's Anime Central 2020, which would have taken place in Illinois on May 15 through the 17 at the Hyatt and Donald E. Stephens convention center. Everyone who purchased a ticket immediately had their registration moved to next year's event. If for whatever reason, you cannot make it to next year's event, the convention is allowing you to request a refund if you fill out a form. However, you must do so before April 20! Additionally, all of the people who registered as a vendor will also have a chance to go next year or request a refund if wanted. If you can make it next year, the event will start on May 21 and continue until May 23 of 2021. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-03-19/anime-central-2020-convention-canceled/.157699]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Kodansha USA Announces Codename: Sailor V Eternal Edition[/color][/b]
If you're a fan of the Sailor Moon series and your favorite character is Sailor Venus, there is some good news for you. Kodansha USA is currently in the works of remastering the "Codename: Sailor V" manga. Dubbed "Codename Sailor V: Eternal Edition," the manga will feature up-to-date translations and beautiful new artwork. The manga is scheduled to be released in January of next year. Hopefully, by then, the COVID-19 epidemic will be over, and there won't be any cancelations or postponing. The manga's story will be, of course, revolved around the beautiful Sailor Venus' backstory before she became a sailor soldier. With that being said, we will get the chance to see when she met her cat, Artemis, as well as received the pen that allows her to transform into a magical girl. Of course, the demographic of Hack Forums are mostly male adults who probably do not care about Sailor Moon, but for those who secretly enjoy this series, this is some awesome news! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-03-18/kodansha-usa-announces-codename-sailor-v-eternal-edition-ghost-in-the-shell-the-human-algorithm-orient-more-manga-for-print/.157638]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cells at Work! Anime's 2nd Season Premieres in January 2021[/color][/b]
Hataraku Saibō, also known as Cells at Work will be having a second season! Expect to see the anime during winter 2021 anime season in January. Movie theatres in Japan will showcase a sneak peek preview of the show in a short film inspired by the fifth volume of the manga. This short film will release on Sep 5 of this year. There's no announcement of whether or not countries outside of Japan will get the release. Usually, it takes a couple of months before a Japanese film hits theatres for outside countries. Will countries outside of Japan have a chance to watch it before the second season? There is no definite answer yet. If you are looking to keep yourself busy, various manga spin-offs were created for your enjoyment. If you have a specific character group that you like, you might be able to read up on them. Bacteria at Work, Cells That Don't Work, Cells at Work! Code Black, Platelets at Work, and Cells at Work! Baby, and Cells at Work! Lady was created and are, of course, reflected around certain cells inside of your body. The anime and manga of the original series were very informative. Therefore, the spin-offs shouldn't stray too far from the original series and you will probably learn a few things, if not more than what we saw in the original series. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-03-21/cells-at-work-anime-2nd-season-premieres-in-january-2021-with-part-of-anime-screening-1st-in-theaters-in-september/.157769]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
